heisigStory: "Plump" is one of those delightful English words that almost sound like their meaning. No sooner do you hear it than you think of a round and ample-bodied person falling into a sofa like a large drop of oil plopping into a fishbowl - kerrrr-plump!
koohiiStory1: A large person with a big drop of sweat dripping off of him because he is so plump.
koohiiStory2: Fat("plump") men always have small penises.....the kanji is a combination of "large" with a drop(representing the small penis between his legs).
myStory: căng. đạt cực đạt có chứa nước làm căng
readingExamples: 太陽 (たいよう), 太鼓 (たいこ), 皇太子 (こうたいし), 太い (ふと.い), 太る (ふと.る)
words:
太鼓(たいこ): drum, tambourine
太陽(たいよう): sun, solar
太る(ふとる): grow fat
太い(ふとい): fat, thick
